text: I can only compare this Nutiva coconut oil to one other that I had tried bearing the Spectrum label.  Perhaps the Spectrum oil is exactly as good for you, but it had no flavor whatsoever.  This Nutiva coconut oil, on the other hand, actually has a delicious coconut flavor.  Well, I think it's delicious.  If you don't like coconut flavor, you'd better try a different brand.
